SELECT * from (select ROWNUM rm, notice_no, title, nick,time_posted, hits, category from (select hnb.notice_no, hnb.title, hm.nick, hnb.time_posted, hnb.hits, hnb.category from hanbit_notice_board hnb inner join hanbit_member hm on hnb.id=hm.id order by hnb.notice_no desc))
where rm between #{pageStart} and #{perPageNum}*#{page}

SELECT hnb.category, hnb.title, hm.nick, hnb.time_posted, hnb.hits, hnb.content, hnb.image, hnb.link, hnb.notice_no FROM hanbit_notice_board hnb INNER JOIN hanbit_member hm ON hnb.id=hm.id WHERE hnb.notice_no = #{values}
